function.name: search_by_ingredient
function.description: Search for medications by active ingredient name in a specified language. Returns all medications containing the exact active ingredient (case-insensitive match). Use this when customers ask about medications with specific active ingredients or want to find alternatives.

ingredient.description: Active ingredient name to search for (e.g., 'Ibuprofen', 'Omeprazole', 'Acetylsalicylic acid'). The search will be case-insensitive but exact match.

lang.description: Language of the ingredient name provided by the user (optional; auto-detected if omitted).
